document_data.mainbody:
he Hulorn was the hereditary ruler of Selgaunt.
The Hulorn was a hereditary title of the merchant-mayor of Selgaunt. Though the Hulorn ruled the city in name, this was more of an honorary position as the real power in Selgaunt lay with the Knights of Selgaunt. The Hulorn lived within the Palace of the Hulorn which was attached to the Hunting Gardens in the northeast region of the city.
* Andeth Ilchammar was Hulorn in 1358 DR.
